attributes.action: Prevent Margaret Thatcher from being honoured with a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mrs Thatcher presided a systematic destruction and breakdown of this country from which we are to recover. To devote a state funeral to such a person would be tantamount to sanctioning such an abominable period of british history.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
